{"id":961818965,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1685641769,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/961818965/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> right_sum(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int sum = 0;\n\n        for (int i = n-2; i >= 0; --i) right_sum[i] = right_sum[i]+right_sum[i+1];\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            sum += nums[i];\n            if (sum == right_sum[i]) return i;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
